data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Rupnagar.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Rupnagar, Punjab, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 7,531 believers find a person of peace today among the 677,069 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.section_summary: On average, 144 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Rupnagar, Punjab, India.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the county of Rupnagar, Punjab, India.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the county of Rupnagar that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Jat Dehia (Sikh traditions) people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Jat Dehia (Sikh traditions) people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Jat Dehia (Sikh traditions) people is yours.
Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Rupnagar, Punjab, India a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Rupnagar that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the county of Rupnagar prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.
